name: logstudio
description: Modern log file viewer and monitor

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:verify: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const main=fs.existsSync('dist/main.js'); const renderer=fs.existsSync('dist/renderer/index.html'); if(!main||!renderer){console.error('Build verification failed'); process.exit(1);} console.log('Build verified successfully');"
scripts.build:push: npm run build && npm run build:verify && git add . && git commit -m "Build: Automatischer Build" && git push origin main
